website_summaries.verdict: Has just about everything the majority of tennis enthusiasts look for in a pair of shoes – comfort, durability, structure, and style.
pros: Offers a modern style and an impressive feature set that makes this shoe suitable for different types of foot structures and court surfaces, including supportive uppers, shock-absorbing gel insoles, and stable rubber outsoles with excellent support
cons: Rare reports of size discrepancies, such as a snug-fitting toe box or loose fit around the ankle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes for narrow feet.
customer_reviews.text: Love them so much I ordered a second pair. I have narrow flat feet and all the comments said they were narrow fitting so I thought I would give them a try. They fit like a glove and and so comfortable. My heel spur has been painful lately and I played a tennis match the other day in these shoes. My spur pain is gone. I couldn't believe that the pain went away so quickly and all I did was wear these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Flygirlhp

customer_reviews.title: Finally an 8 is an 8  Thank you Asics
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing a size 8 tennis shoe forever. I just had to return two other brand names because they were incredibly small (how could this be) I know my feet have not grown, is the shoe industry changing, does it matter where they are made? The sizes weren't even close to an 8 as I have known them all my life. I took a chance on these because I have worn ASICS before and sure enough they fit perfect! Size 8 is a Size 8. To top it off they are a great looking shoe! Comfortable with little to no break in. I would highly recommend these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Puchala

customer_reviews.title: AHAR outsole
customer_reviews.text: The fit and comfort level are fine. These tennis GEL solution shoes did not last beyond 3 months! I inadvertently slipped on the indoors courts and looked a peek at the bottom of these shoes. The so-called AHAR outsole was completely worn through to the next layer! Buyer beware...Asics has a guarantee on this outsole but only for their resolution line! Money down the drain that quickly!
customer_reviews.author: crf

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you use your own insoles
customer_reviews.text: these shoes are great once I placed some gel insoles in them. They are lightweight and work well on the Tennis court. Before I placed my own insoles they were uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Great fit but terrible product. I am a fan of ASICS and have always liked their shoes but the soles on these are defective and wear down at an alarming rate (like within a month of minor wear), and ASICS will not stand behind this product, so buyer beware.... Now that I am having this issue I see a similar review of this same product.
customer_reviews.author: tx reader

customer_reviews.title: Most uncomfortable shoe ever. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: This was my third pair of ASICS but the first pair that I have ordered online. They were not near the comfort level of the previous two pairs that I had purchased. They are the most uncomfortable tennis shoes that I have ever worn. My high heels at work are more comfortable. I bought Iinsoles to hopefully make them wearable but that did not work. Do not buy these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... gel solution slam ASICs tennis shoes are the most comfortable and responsive tennis shoes I have ever worn since ...
customer_reviews.text: These gel solution slam ASICs tennis shoes are the most comfortable and responsive tennis shoes I have ever worn since the ASICS gel resolution 4, absolutely amazing! I always get an extra pair of these because of afraid they’ll be gone forever and they did sell out for a while and I was panicking. Also there a phenomenal price value.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Styles-Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Got this shoe for exercises that included side to side movements. Has great stability and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Helm

customer_reviews.title: I like these tennis sneakers a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like these tennis sneakers a lot, but they are not as light weight as I expected, I am getting used to the weight each time I play.
customer_reviews.author: ginger ivers

customer_reviews.title: 5 level and these provide me great comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Asics never fail me! I play tennis at 4.5 level and these provide me great comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Anderson

product_meta.title: ASICS Women's GEL-Solution Slam 3 Tennis Shoe
product_meta.description:
Like its older cousin in the GEL-Solution™ series, the new GEL-Solution Slam™ 3 tennis shoe is light in weight but not in performance. The new GEL-Solution Slam™ 3 GEL-Solution Slam 3-W features a low-profile midsole which offers our SpEVA® midsole material for enhanced cushioning. A lightweight midfoot Trusstic® technology ensures torsional stability while the solid rubber outsole provides sure-footed traction on a variety of hard court surfaces. The lightweight upper features a combination of synthetic leather and air mesh enhancing breathability and flexibility making this the perfect choice for the tennis player looking for a great lightweight, lower-profile shoe at a value price.

In 1949, Mr. Kihachiro Onitsuka began his athletic footwear company (Onitsuka Co., Ltd.) by manufacturing basketball shoes out of his living room in Kobe, Japan. He chose the name ASICS for his company in 1977, based on a famous Latin phrase "Anima Sana In Corpore Sano," which, when translated, expresses the ancient ideal of "A Sound Mind in a Sound Body." Taking the acronym of this phrase, ASICS was founded on the belief that the best way to create a healthy and happy lifestyle is to promote total health and fitness. Today, ASICS offers a full line of performance-driven athletic shoes and technical active sports apparel and accessories dedicated to bringing harmony to the body and soul.
feature_bullets: AHAR Outsole: Acronym for ASICS High Abrasion Rubber. Placed in critical areas of the outsole for exceptional durability.
Forefoot GEL Cushioning System (COURT): Attenuates shock during impact phase.
SpEVA Midsole Material: Improves bounce back characteristics and decreases midsole breakdown.
Synthetic Leather Upper: Easy to clean.
Trusstic System Technology: Reduces the weight of the sole unit while retaining the structural integrity of the shoe.
